attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Revise a prisoners sentence. Make the term SHORTER, CONSTRUCTIVE, and LESS PLEASANT. Shorter sentence will make available space, and reduce overcrowding and staff pressures. Constructive to teach a trade, reading, sport discipline. Less pleasant, by limiting or rationing facilities that prisoners value most.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
